amendment.description: To authorize a program to provide health, medical, and life insurance benefits to workers at the Rocky Flats Environmental Technology Site, Colorado, who would otherwise fail to qualify for such benefits because of an early physical completion date.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 53. Record Vote Number: 304.

action.text: Amendment SA 2423 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S12386-12389; text: CR S12386) To authorize a program to provide health, medical, and life insurance benefits to workers at the Rocky Flats Environmental Technology Site, Colorado, who would otherwise fail to qualify for such benefits because of an early physical completion date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2423 proposed by Senator Allard.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 53. Record Vote Number: 304.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 53. Record Vote Number: 304.
